lines.text: What we came up with... can't be all there is to it.
No, like- that extra-virgin virgin's blood, for example!
I mean, it hasn't come up at all, has it?
No, it's- I refuse to accept that!
I refuse to accept an explanation that doesn't explain why that bottle should be remitted to my protective custody!
You ain't gettin' the consarned blood, Seeker.
